hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Recovery Momentum in High-Beta Alts
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a period of depressed liquidity (October crash), the first 5% BTC rally in a neutral regime will trigger outsized, sustained momentum in high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX) as sidelined capital re-enters through liquid, high-conviction proxies.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Post-liquidity shock, the first convincing rally often sees capital flow into the most liquid altcoin 'blue chips' (SOL, AVAX) as traders seek beta but remain wary of illiquid small-caps. This creates a momentum cascade.
entry_conditions: Aggregate Crypto Spot Volume (7D MA) crosses above its 30D MA

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/USD reaches 1.618 Fibonacci extension of the entry candle's range
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL/BTC ratio falls below its 20-day low
exit_conditions.time_exit: 7 days after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC rallies >5% but SOL/BTC ratio fails to turn positive, or aggregate volume remains below its 30D MA, indicating the rally is not supported by broad liquidity return.
